short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds or removes a border from semantic elements on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Frame: Enhance Your Web Experience

Description: Focus Frame is a lightweight and intuitive Chrome extension that allows you to quickly toggle borders on semantic HTML elements across any webpage. Whether youâ€™re a developer, designer, or just someone looking to visually enhance the layout of a page, Focus Frame helps you focus on key elements by highlighting them with an eye-catching border.

Features:

Dynamic Border Toggle: Easily add or remove borders around semantic HTML elements such as <header>, <nav>, <section>, <article>, <footer>, and more.
Tab-Specific State: The extension maintains its toggle state per tab, ensuring that the borders on one tab do not affect others. You can toggle borders independently for each open tab.
Instant Feedback: Toggle borders with a single click on the extension icon, and see immediate results on your active tab.
Non-Intrusive: Uses outline instead of border to avoid altering the layout or positioning of elements on the page. This makes it a seamless tool to enhance content visibility without disrupting the original design.
How it Works:

Add Borders: Click the Focus Frame icon to add vibrant borders around semantic elements on the page, such as navigation bars, sections, articles, and footers.
Remove Borders: Click the icon again to remove the borders and restore the page to its original state.
Tab Isolation: Each tab has its own independent state, so you can toggle the borders on a tab without affecting others.
Use Cases:

Web Developers: Quickly visualize the layout of semantic elements and debug the structure of web pages.
UI/UX Designers: Preview how various layout elements are positioned and help identify areas that may need attention.
General Users: Enhance your browsing experience by focusing on specific page sections like headers or footers.
Whether you're debugging, designing, or just want a better way to visually organize web pages, Focus Frame provides an easy-to-use solution that adds clarity to your digital environment.
